data.title: Inconsistent
data.content:
Here I am and the Streak Reminder hasn‚Äôt worked the last 4 days and the last 2 days, not getting any affirmations ‚Äî yes, I have cleared all my notifications on my home screen as previously suggested. I‚Äôm feeling frustrated because I‚Äôve had this app 2 years and until this year, I had virtually no issues. I hope you can fix this quickly because I really do love this app and it is good for me.

**UPDATE TO REVIEW**
15JAN26‚Äì this app has continued to get worse the longer that I use it. I haven‚Äôt received any affirmations in a week now; yes, I‚Äôve cleared all my notifications. And with their last update to the app itself, the alarm for my streak reminder has disappeared. In addition, when I manually open the app, the screen is white and takes nearly 20 full seconds to load. I definitely will not continue my paid subscription when it‚Äôs due for renewal. This app has had too many bugs, glitches, and in hasn‚Äôt worked consistently and properly in months.

[22JAN26] MonkeyTaps you say you read every single review..  another week has elapsed and I have not received one single affirmation. I‚Äôve been cleaning ALL my notifications on my iPhone as previously instructed. I‚Äôve updated the app, I‚Äôve rebooted, I‚Äôve manually opened the app, etc., and still nothing. I don‚Äôt know why your team hasn‚Äôt yet fixed this issue. I do like the app‚Äî when it works properly.

[06FEB26] - I guess no one reads this but I‚Äôm going to write anyway. My app gave me affirmations all day this past Tuesday after not working for a couple weeks. However, it gave me the ‚ÄúTap Here to Continue Receiving Affirmations‚Äù warning (which was random because it had been giving me my affirmations regularly up to that moment on Tuesday. Since that notification popped up, I‚Äôve had no more affirmations.

[10FEB26] ‚Äî though I have the most recent update, there‚Äôs still a glitch in the coding apparently. Two days ago, I finally started receiving my affirmations. They were constant until the ‚ÄúTap to continue receiving notifications‚Äù popped up. I clicked on it, it took me to the Home Screen of the app, but that‚Äôs where the affirmations stopped. This is what happened last time. Please fix this app. Show that you care about providing an app that is reliable and helpful more than just intermittently.

[18FEB26] ‚Äî I guess this company is not interested in constructive feedback and trying to remove the errors/glitches in their app. I‚Äôve gotten 1 actual affirmation in the last 5 days. I have, as always, done everything it suggests to trouble shoot so I know it‚Äôs in the coding and not on my end. I definitely will not renew this app; what‚Äôs the point of trying to improve my thinking if the app doesn‚Äôt work and the developers don‚Äôt care to fix it.

data.title: Not impressed
data.content: I‚Äôve used the app for a few weeks now and I‚Äôm just not impressed. There‚Äôs not much to it at all. The ‚Äúpractice‚Äù of daily affirmations is just a series of sentences being read to you in a robotic voice. The interface is pretty, but that‚Äôs about it. I don‚Äôt know why the introductory questionnaire even exists because all of the settings/topics I chose at the beginning aren‚Äôt the focus when you get into the app. You can choose from a multitude of subjects to focus on but then I find myself irritated that I have to scroll thru them all again and again if I want to change anything. There‚Äôs no real incentive or insights available while you‚Äôre using it either- just prompts you to ‚Äúread‚Äù the affirmations each day and then- boom, you‚Äôre done! It‚Äôs just boring AI slop.

data.title: Helpful
data.content:
Thank you so much for this. It took a while to find something free. Easy to navigate. There‚Äôs basic customization, which is a delight. I appreciate being able to add custom affirmations. The reminder notifications is nice to see throughout the stressful day. The widgets are calming reminders. I like the interface with the swiping through affirmations and ability to heart especially helpful ones or ones that resonate with me. 
Thank you again. I feel like a better person when I regularly use this app.

data.title: Constant alarm
data.content: I tried this app for its free trial and I enjoyed a few of the affirmations and the aesthetics and considered continuing my subscription. However, I unfortunately allowed the app to create an alarm for daily reminders and now I can‚Äôt find it to turn it off. I turned off the alarm switch in the app itself and still got the alarm on my phone every day at the same time. Then I deleted the app and I am still getting that same alarm and it‚Äôs not showing up in my phone clock alarm app to turn off either. So this makes me fully distrust this app and I won‚Äôt be resubscribing since I now have to google how to remove this alarm from my phone.
